POINT_CLASSIFICATION kmPlaneClassifyPoint ( const kmPlane *  pIn,
const kmVec3 *  pP 
)

Returns POINT_INFRONT_OF_PLANE if pP is infront of pIn. Returns POINT_BEHIND_PLANE if it is behind. Returns POINT_ON_PLANE otherwise
